titleInfo.title: Letter from Charles Grant, Bahrein, to Lewis Pelly, Political Resident in the Persian Gulf, Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter regarding the behaviour of the crew of the bullfinchwhilst in Bahrein which had caused some rows, Grant's concern that the rows may escalate owing to their drunken behaviour and his intention to go aboard the bullfinchto discuss the matter with Captain Charles Arthur Lodder.The letter also reports on the general situation of the Island highlighting that there have not been any robberies there for some time.
